Changes.Message: Added `-harmonydir` which allows you to modify the directory path of HarmonyMods.
Added HookUpdates in the carbon/config.json file (replaces +carbon.skiphookupdates logic)
Added `harmony.mods` admin command which prints a list of all currently loaded HarmonyMods (mods processed by Rust)
Fixed rare NRE in Carbon.Bootstrap occasionally created by specific plugins
Fixed float value precision (Pitereq's fix for LUI builder) - fixes Carbon panel range options malfunctioning
Fixed `Checksum validation failure` warnings prohibiting hooks becoming patched
Updated CarbonAuto chat options to be taken into account when printing `Unknown command` messages to game chat (eg. avatar)
Don't attempt to unpatch methods if we didn't patch any
[Admin Module] Fixed spectating UI not updating accordingly when spectating players that go to sleep/disconnect
[Admin Module] Fixed occasional Entities tab NRE (ending the spectate of a player that became forsaken)
No longer assign ownership on F1 console spawned items if `c.nogivenotices` is enabled
Removed CorePlugin autopatch override
Moved `[AutoPatch]` processing logic to BaseHookable (from RustPlugin) so modules also get processed
Added patch priority/order to [AutoPatch]. [More info here](https://docs.carbonmod.gg/docs/collaborate/adding-hooks/plugin-patches-hooks#automatic-way)
Added Carbon.Profiler (and included it into Roslyn)
Added brand new LUI system, an ultra-fast CUI building system (thanks ThePitereq!)
Significantly optimized CUI building speed
Added `c.createplugin` which creates a new blank plugin with the `OnServerInitialized` hook
Fixed an issue where `timer.Reset` wouldn't properly reset the timer's delay
Removed default values for ScrollView
Removed unused mask softness property from CUI
[Admin Module] Pinned config editor options
[Admin Module] Pinned Configuration tab options at the top
[Admin Module] Pinned Plugins tab search bar
[Admin Module] Optimized local methods in a few places by changing them from local to static
Added failsafe deprecated extension to redirect plugins using Effect.Clear with a boolean parameter, to compile and properly execute on staging/next update
Removed hook generator code from HookCaller and moved it to Carbon.Generator.Shared
Added Carbon.Generator.Shared reference
[Vanish Module] Fixed vanish icon and text remaining on-screen after waking up from dying
[Vanish Module] Moved the vanish UI in the `Under` UI layer
Removed LogSpamCleanup patch (Facepunch removed the log)
Added `-harmonydir` which allows you to modify the directory path of HarmonyMods
Inject UnityEngine.AssetBundleModule into the Roslyn compiler
Enforce publicisation for Rust.FileSystem.dll
Fixed missing Carbon.Native build from Release builds
Added `c.changeversion` (It changes the current Carbon version you're running. Next reboot will swap to the overriden version. Run `c.changeversion` for syntax.)
Updated various places where documenting syntax and help descriptions with updated information
Fixed situations where `[Permission]` attribute response would not be replied to in the same context
Made no permission, no group and no auth level client chat/console command returns phrased and translatable
Fixed moderator group being granted to auth level 2 users
Removed Library from Timer
Fixed casting a plugin to bool returning false even if the instance is alive without considering if the plugin has initialized
[Admin Module] Reduced unecessary data processing and unused code in the Plugins tab
[Admin Module] Fixed plugin uninstalling process
[Admin Module] Fixed instances where vendor plugins would not properly pair up with loaded plugins
Added `c.delete` and `c.deleteext` admin commands
[Admin Module] Fixed issue where favorited plugins would not save upon reboot
[Admin Module] **Completely revamped the Plugins tab**
[Admin Module] Improved config editing error handling
[GatherManager Module] Fixed inaccurate values when gathering resource dispensers
[AutoWipe Module] Added `WipeChatCommand` which defaults to nothing, can be set with `autowipe.wipechat` so anyone can run `/wipe` to see when the next wipe happens
[AutoWipe Module] Added string replacements for [WIPE_DAY], [WIPE_MONTH] etc of the server name
[Vanish Module] Fixed situations where players loading into the server vanished, don't have vanished perks
[Vanish Module] Added offset values for vanishing icon and reset previous anchor values
[Admin Module] Added informational message under Configurations->ConVars tab (regarding values not being saved deliberately)
[Vanish Module] Implemented various optimizations and reusable effect instances
Handle reloaded plugins on server shutdown
Fixed returning types of OxideMod.LoadPlugin/ReloadPlugin
Added ReloadAllPlugins (compat)
Enforce publicized default assemblies in the config
Updated [AutoWipe module](https://docs.carbonmod.gg/docs/core/modules/autowipe-module)
Stripped irrelevant configuration from Preloader
Updated Harmony to v2.3.5
Execute self updating process relative to Carbon root path (`-carbon.rootdir`)
Include `Carbon.Hooks.Oxide.dll` and `Carbon.Hooks.Community.dll` in the patch (applies to all Carbon builds)
Removed Carbon Harmony processors (switched to using Rust vanilla)
Inject `Cronos` into Roslyn compiler
Added hook exception tracking (plugin total and per-hook instance)
Added publicized assemblies config
Added publicizer blacklist config options
Updated Carbon-called commands to use a cached argument buffer
[Admin Module] Added Codefling login analytic
Removed HarmonyWatchers config + command
Show internal/hidden hooks in `c.hooks`
Made `IOnServerInitialized` a callable hook
Automatically remove predefined aliases for `harmony.load` -> `c.harmonyload` and unload
Added alias warning whenever trying to assign an alias on an already existent Rust command
Added silly goose proof handling for people assigning a command with the same assigning key as value (creating stackoverflows)
Added developer mode
Export all in-memory patched assemblies to `carbon/developer/patched_assemblies` directory
Added GC events flag in Shift+REC profiles in the Profiler tab (enabled by default)
Added `c.editconfig` which when called by an admin client, will open up a json config at a relative path (eg. carbon/config.json) and allow you edit it in Carbon's panel
Optimized hook calling slightly by reducing allocs when checking hook conflicts
[Admin Module] Fixed file path when downloading files through the Plugins tab
Fixed Rust console occasional NRE (when disabling Rust console, aka `-noconsole`)
Added default conditional compilation symbol `OXIDE_PUBLICIZED`
Added `GetMessageByLanguage`
Added missing RustExtensionMethods (compatibility with Oxide)
Added missing RustExtensionMethods (compatibility with Oxide)
Added [AutoWipe module](https://docs.carbonmod.gg/docs/core/modules/autowipe-module)
Added `OnCarbonVanished(BasePlayer)` and `OnCarbonUnvanished(BasePlayer)` hook calls whenever players use Vanish
No longer write patched/publicized assemblies to disk (keeping Rust entirely vanilla)
Load all in-memory patched assemblies before Unity does (so ours have priority)
Stripped away all self-updating code and moved to Carbon.Startup
Added Carbon.Startup, which handles Oxide migration and publicization/patching whereas Carbon.Preloader solely only handles self-updating
Fire 'LoadDefaultConfig' as a hook on the plugin if plugins don't override the method
Added StackWalk allocations option to the Shift+REC modal, as well as timeline recording
Reload harmony mods when running `harmony.load` and the mod is already loaded
Added `c.devdump` - Creates a zip package in the temporary directory of the Carbon folder with useful information (output log & profile snapshot)
Added Facepunch Steam references into Roslyn compiler
Stripped away Harmony v1 support
Removed HAB bump debug log spam fix
Pooled various instances of CarbonEventArgs and ModuleEventArgs
Improved analytics performance
Added pooling across all instances where CarbonEventArgs is passed through our processors
Fixed certain same-named hooks getting fired when they shouldn't in plugins/modules
Added default `moderator` group which gets auto-granted/revoked when players are in/out the auth-level 1 group
Added `ConfigVersionChecks` override to BaseModule, enabled by default
Fullscreen tabs for config editing when doing setup wizard
Fixed Lang NRE (thanks Kulltero!)
Added CuiRawImageComponent.SteamId property which is used for placing the steam avatar on the image
Shifted preinit callback to fire before the constructor
Record constructor failure as a compilation failure once thrown (Thank's BugMan!)
Fixed `c.reload` not attempting to load up unloaded plugins
Notify user when a compilation started upon running `c.load` or `c.reload` on an unloaded file
Removed obsolete `PoolEx` methods
Added SelectiveEAC module - disabled by default, permission and group based system selectively allowing admin users to enter a `server.secure 1` server bypassing EAC authentication
Added early injection of a new player in the permissions database on `CanUserLogin`
[Vanish Module] Made vanishing and unvanishing effects configurable
[Vanish Module] Fixed players vanishing on Cargo Ship or other parent triggers being detached
[Vanish Module] Always perform Enter/Leave triggers properly when vanished
[ModeratorTools Module] Removed obsolete patch
[Admin Module] Fixed setup wizard with latest changes
Renamed Optimisations to Circular Networking since that's what it is
Improved ImageDatabase performance and reliability
Added Plugins.GetAllNonAlloc
Added `c.grant group xx *` and `c.revoke user xx *` (wildcard) options
Added obsolete attribute on custom dictionary/stringbuilder Carbon pool methods (will be removed on Nov. 7th 2024)
Improved Carbon.Entities
Added SelectiveEAC module - disabled by default, permission and group based system selectively allowing admin users to enter a `server.secure 1` server bypassing EAC authentication
Fixed situations when hooks accessing the permissions system in the CanUserLogin user access and refreshing is too late
Updated various repositories with respect to the new `Facepunch.Pool` updates
Updates to Carbon's `Assemblies` and dynamic library monitoring
Removed Carbon.Assemblies `Unload` calls
Fixed situations where default plugin messages/lang phrases would be loaded multiple times
Fixed whenever having `skipassetwarmup_crashes` enabled, Carbon would be executing OnServerInitialized too early
Updated Carbon's logging system to print logs executed in different threads to Rust's native output log
Added more timer formats to Countdown (according to https://github.com/Facepunch/Rust.Community/pull/63)
Removed extra clears for Carbon's PoolEx extensions (since Rust's Facepunch.Pool handles it all now)
[Admin Module] Updated the 'Local' subtab to 'Installed' under the Plugins tab
[Admin Module] Fixed Codefling thumbnails and larger scale thumbnail (as well as first frame of gifs are being now used)
Added ImageDatabase.Queue for singular images (key/url or just url)
[Admin Module] Added player wetness properties to the Entities and Players tab
Added NotoSansArabicBold to Carbon's CUI
Added multiple plugin name support for `c.reload`, `c.unload` and `c.load` commands (eg. `c.reload PluginA PluginB PluginC`)
Updated `c.reload`: No longer recompile manually reloaded plugins if there are no changes, and reuse runtime assemblies of said plugins to create the plugin type instance
Updated `c.reload`: Recompile the plugin if profiler tracking status changed for the scripts
Updated `c.reload`: Recompile if script watchers is disabled
Fixed CUI server induced client NRE (this also fixes CUI updating): Forcefully serialize all properties instead of skipping defaults
Corrected multithreaded notice/informative logging color (grey)
Added `PoolEx.FreeRaycastHitList` used by the codegen system (possibly a bandaid fix)
Added pooling to ImageDatabase and sped processing up from 500ms to frame time
Fixed plugin class and namespace identification: fixes cases where plugins would have nested namespaces or other types above the main plugin type
[Admin Module] Removed server event toast config
[Gather Manager Module] Include caught fish and scale collected amount based on module settings
No longer print suggestion log in console if the command string is null or empty
Updated DepotDownloader to use the latest commit
Removed unnecessary copyright notice from the top of each file since it falls back to the project license
Changed loading of plugins to finalize before Asset Warmup and only load Asset Warmup when all Carbon systems are online
Initial iteration at adding summary comments across the entire project
Fixed issue where admin module not storing quick actions to file when changed
Fixed `lang` NRE
Added `Carbon.Defines.GetHooksFolder`
Renamed TimerFormats -> TimerFormat
Close the file panel before executing the OnConfirm/OnClose callbacks (so users don't click on buttons multiple times if the action takes a while)
Optimized `Carbon.Community.Protect` to cache its values using the input as key
Fixed issue in CallHook with the object array of arguments, using index 13 instead of 12
No longer add post batch failed requirees multiple times
Removed various unused references from unrelated repository projects
Upgraded Roslyn from 4.9.0 -> 4.12.4
Upgraded Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.9.0-3.final [prerelease] -> 4.10.0
Fixed Carbon NuGet to use the latest API key (yearly renewed) and removed old versions
Removed Carbon.Common.Client
Removed Carbon.Common.Client from compiler whitelist
No longer post process converted by default harmony mods as all the logic happens in the converter
Added Profiler serialization and comparison mode (protocolized)
Added File browser module
Fixes, improvements and optimizations to `Community.Protect`
Profiles store non-incremented values of incrementative assemblies which get used for comparison purpose
Updated `c.harmonymods` to use Carbon's `Assemblies`
Added `UnsubscribeAll` and `GetHookSubscribers(string identifier)` to patch manager
Filtered out command execution for `no_input` (default value of key binds without a command defined)
Various ImageDatabase improvements & callback fixes
Fixed Profiler incrementals
Removed scaling in ImageDatabase (fixing GDI+ issues)
Fixed certain errors occurring in LoadPlugin when plugin was invalid/non-existent
Added Carbon.Assemblies which tracks ALL Carbon processed assemblies
No longer save data + groups when SetLanguage happens
No longer run OnDisabled / OnEnabled on modules when using `c.loadmodule`
Updated cleanup process upon data + group saving and cleared leftover memory whenever it happens
Fixed multi-word Carbon Auto convar values not properly applying upon restart
Show more accurate warning in the Carbon profiler tab when things went wrong upon boot
Optimized C4C model networking to use Rust's snapshot system
No longer default to ClientPanels.OverlayNonScaled, which affects existent CUI panels
Various fixes in the ImageDatabase module
Fixed `del` command patch not properly error handling
Improvements to the newly implemented Carbon Integration Test system
No longer attempt to convert Harmony mods if they're processable
Show more accurate warning in the Carbon profiler tab when things went wrong with its loading
Flipped source viewer horizontal scrolling
Added `BaseHookable.ManualSubscriptions`
Added `Plugin.ManualCommands` and `BaseModule.ManualCommands`
Fixed `OnPlayerCommand` not firing at the right time
Fixed hook argument resizing causing inconsistency and data loss to argument values
**Added Carbon self-updating** and according configuration
Added admin and player default group error handling for if it becomes null upon config loading
Fixed logging issue where exception logs are being printed only on RustPlayer hookables when there are commands or timer failures
Removed `c.unitystacktrace` config and enabled it by default
Removed `Column` from Failed plugins section under `c.plugins` and merged it with Line (`line:column` format)
Added Unity Component cache Carbon component
Preload covalence on sleeping players when the server initializes
Fixed malformed material in the Carbon Profiler CUI
[Admin Module] Added Plugins tab vendor reliant and informative error handling for endpoints in case they go down
[Admin Module] Added confirmation dialog whenever changing hostname (Carbon tab)
[Admin Module] Added max players option with confirmation (Carbon tab)
Removed `c.fetchhooks` until more thorough testing is done whenever using it
[Admin Module] Remember session information upon closing and reopening the Admin module instead removing temporary information
Changed all CarbonAuto float/integer variables to be multipliers relative to vanilla value.
Added Overall, OverlayNonScaled and UnderNonScaled client panels to Carbon's CUI
[Admin Module] Fixed CanAccessAdminModule hook
Allow custom parent string in CreateContainer (CUI) (thanks SegFault!)
Added Carbon module and extension hotloading (and respective file watching configurations)
Made suggestive chat command messages lang configurable
Added `c.lang` which sets the server language
Added Carbon analytics config option (enabled by default - it's entirely anonymous and helps us improve)
Renamed ICarbonModule to `IModulePackage`
Renamed ModLoader.LoadedPackages -> ModLoader.Packages
Added `c.custommapname` which changes the map displayed in the server browser (CarbonAuto)
No longer refresh the whole panel when toggling chart layers (only individual elements)
[Admin Module] Added Teleport2OwnedItem button on players (Entities and Players tab)
Removed unused Carbon updater
**Added command aliases** - `c.assignalias myalias realcommand`, `c.unassignalias myalias`, `c.aliases`
Added 'Unknown command' message when executing invalid commands with valid prefixes
Removed `o.` and `oxide.` filtering and config
Removed `o.` command analytics
[Admin Module] Added display name to Carbon Auto variables (present in Admin module configurations tab)
Added default aliases: harmony.load -> `c.harmonyload`, harmony.unload -> `c.harmonyunload`
Added `c.harmonywatchers` (enabled by default)
Added Harmony patching and unpatching support for assemblies
Added `c.harmonymods` printing a full list of mods and patches created by the mods
Added Suggestions algorithm (Levenshtein) component - grants 3 suggestions for chat and console inaccurate commands
Added craft duration multipler - Carbon Auto (`c.craftingspeedmultiplier_nowb`, `c.craftingspeedmultiplier_wb1`, `c.craftingspeedmultiplier_wb2`, `c.craftingspeedmultiplier_wb3`)
Added `c.whymodded` and `c.gocommunity`
[Admin Module] Added background blur and opacity settings to Admin module
Fixed edge case issue with case insensitive hook and method names
Renamed `BaseModule.GetEnabled()` to `BaseModule.IsEnabled()`
Create debug internal files if plugins are marked partial regardless of the debugger attached status
Fixed conflicting issue with `BaseHookable.Type` by renaming it to `BaseHookable.HookableType`
Fixed NREs in IPlayer's RustPlayer
Fixed Harmony mods not properly patching when hotloaded
Fixed Carbon not initializing properly when `server.autouploadmap` is disabled
Include aliases in console command suggestions
Automated hook building process for Community and Oxide remotely updated hooks
No longer reload the entire module when saving an Admin module edited config
Observe Task exceptions (prints exceptions on GC collections)
[Admin Module] Added fade gradient effect across the entire Admin module CUI
[Admin Module] Added DisableConsole option to Carbon's config
[Admin Module] Revamped range UI options in Admin module
[Admin Module] Lock cursor only when spectating asleep players
[Admin Module] Clamp Admin module minimum auth level (0 - 3)
Added ScrollView/Scrollbar support for Rust's UI
Added ScrollView support for Carbon's CUI
**Added native Mono Profiler**
[Admin Module] **Added Profiler tab with exporting support**
Added conversion for return types
Fixed GenericPosition NRE in IPlayer
Added stopwatch pooling to our PoolEx extensions
Added SourceCode bank (cached and fast c# source code decompilation component)
[Admin Module] Added source viewer
[Admin Module] Added notifications
Added `c.show perm (value)` which lists all players and groups that have that permission granted
Added `carbon/logs/profiler` for profiler exports
Added `adminmodule.profiler.use`, `adminmodule.profiler.startstop` and `adminmodule.profiler.sourceviewer` permissions
Added CarbonNative
Added `Init`, `LoadDefaultMessages`, `Loaded`, `OnLoaded` and `Unload` hook metadata
Compressed `carbon` and `modded` Steam tags
Fixed OnCompilationmFail and OnConstructorFail description
Added `OnServerCommand` metadata
Added Oxide AutoPatch attribute and implementation (compatibility)
Added Chart graphic component
Removed TimeAverageGeneric (obsolete)
Removed `c.plugintrackingtime` (obsolete)
Added Source Viewer component
Fixed compatibility with ScrollViews (Oxide)
Updated CarbonAuto to no longer force the server with the modded tag
Added `c.safezonerecycletick` CarbonAuto ConVar
Fixed CarbonAuto initializing too late
Improved and fixed various issues with the Profiler (timeline)
Fixed inaccurate data in the Timeline graph (the side values for call times)
Added Profiler analytics
Added `c.usergroup addall|removeall [group]` which adds/removes all players from/to a group
Updated hook updater to use `carbonmod.gg` hosting for protocol-based hook downloading on server boot
Added instantiated sampling for basic and timeline profiling (separated)
Made tweaking `c.defaultserverchatname`, `c.defaultserverchatcolor` and `c.defaultserverchatid` to no longer mark the server modded
Added `OnUserGroupAdded` and `OnUserGroupRemoved` metadata
Removed HarmonyInstance-related replacers from all parsers
Added platform info on the startup log regarding Rust and Carbon build information
Fixed CarbonAuto not saving properly
Renamed `Community.Runtime.CorePlugin` to `Community.Runtime.Core`
[Admin Module] Added maximize button for Admin module
[Admin Module] Added Carbon Auto variables in the Admin module configuration tab
Disabled chart shadows by default (shadows 0)
Added CarbonModule.AutoPatch
Added support for method type (getter/setter..) for our HookAttribute
Fixed WebRequests throwing invalid callback errors
[Admin Module] Fixed Codefling verification and spam
[Admin Module] **Added Quick Actions to the main Carbon tab**
[Admin Module] Added player and entity position map coordinates to Admin module
Fixed IPlayer.Object not being properly assigned (Covalence)
Fixed permission registration when reloading Admin Module (and its config)
[Admin Module] Added Configuration tab permission (adminmodule.config.use)
[Admin Module] Include item ID and shortname in the Items tab, and make them copyable
Updated various instances where we're using ClientRPC to use RpcTarget (Rust update)
[Admin Module] **Added language editor (plugin phrases)**
Updated `c.hooks` to include various more information regarding its hooks and overall performance
Fixed CallHook NRE when using `CallHook<T>` with the return of a null value
Added partial searching to `c.plugininfo`, `c.moduleinfo` & other instance specific commands
Updated `c.savemodulecfg` and `c.loadmodulecfg` (previously 'config')
Don't unload plugins when re-compilation fails (by default, configurable)
Various Covalence compatibility improvements
Added `c.unloadonfailure` Compiler configuration
[Admin Module] Added 'Empower Stats' button in the Players tab (sets all stats to highest)
Removed base module shutdown debug message
Slightly revamped WebRequest async method functionality
Updated `c.version` (include Rust build date), `c.build`, `c.commit` and `c.protocol` (and exposed them for auth level 0)
Disabled `c.reloadextensions` and `c.reloadmodules`
Removed `c.filenamecheck` and implementation
Updated and cleaned up `c.plugins` and `c.modules`
Fixed Compat `GetMessage` (thanks Patrette!)
**Added built-in Oxide migration process**
Updated `OnCompilationFail(ModLoader.FailedCompilation` parameters
**Updated to Harmony 2.3.3.0**
Added `c.commit` (prints information about the Git commit of the runtime Carbon build)
Fixed `Build.IsDebug` not being accessible due to it being static
Added appropriate response when executing `c.grant` or `c.revoke` and the parameter is inexistent
Added LineType support to InputField Carbon CUI component
[Admin Module] Added Items tab to Carbon's configuration page (can create custom items)
[Admin Module] Cache Configuration tab, than regenerate it each time it's showing initially
[Admin Module] Fixed 'Hide plugin icons' config option
Updated Permission's UserHasPermission to use a runtime dictionary which fills up the cache as plugins need the users
Fixed covalence FindPlayerById only looking for player bodies active on the server (now uses user data file)
Added `Permissions` instance in CarbonModule
Added `c.debughook (hookid|name) [duration]` (helps identifying what plugins fire a specific hook and logs each time it fires) [debug build only]
Don't print compile time for precompiled hookables
Cleaned up Plugins tab to use IEnumerables instead of arrays
[Admin Module] Run `module.Reload` instead of `module.Load` when saving module config in config editor (properly restarts the module)
[Admin Module] Added Reload button on installed Plugins
Revamped overall code quality in `ModLoader` (expected to reduce heap allocations even further)
[Admin Module] Added Rust backpack looting hooks and logic (follow on-screen instructions)
Added cached hook lag spike processing
Hook lag spike threshold command + config
Include plugin and hook lag spike information in `c.plugins`, `c.plugininfo`, `c.modules` and `c.moduleinfo`
Added `c.resethooks` which clears all progerss on all of the current hooks (hook time, fires, memory usage and lag spikes)
Fixed CarbonPlugin built in harmony patch errors not showing the exception stacktrace
Removed `c.report`, `carbon/reports` folder and overall implementation (obsolete)
Automatically cleanup the `carbon/reports` folder on preload
Added OS commands for opening various Carbon folders (eg. c.openconfigs, c.opendata, c.openroot..)
Added `c.openplugin PluginName` which opens the `.cs` file of the plugin
Added unloaded and compilation failure plugins at the bottom of the `c.plugins` command
No longer include version in the name of the DLL binaries (breaks referencing)
Added bool `CanAcceptBackpackItem[2803314817]`(Item backpack, Item item) (Item hook)
Added `OnCompilationFail[150731668]`(string filePath, Trace[] errors, Trace[] warnings) [Engine hook]
Added `OnConstructorFail[937285752]`(RustPlugin plugin, Exception exception) [Engine hook]
Added Carbon patch which fixes `c.defaultserverchatid` to override the user id Rust uses when sending server chat messages
Fixed IDelFix failing by adding error handling (thanks Tryhard!)
Added Carbon patch which patches out the Rust 'Bump' log in HotAirBalloon
Fixed `CuiHelper.AddUi` occasionally breaking things when plugins provide null players to it
Revoke Codefling auth token on non-200 error codes
Removed `OnServerInitialized` hook from modules
Updated shutdown process to run `Shutdown()` on modules on server shutdown
Fixed various timing issues within modules
Added `ConVarSnapshots` (takes a snapshot of all default Rust ConVar values)
Fire blank InternalCallHook initially
[Admin Module] Refreshed Admin module buttons and CUI
[Admin Module] Added configurations tab to Admin module (gear button next to X)
[Admin Module] Removed obsolete DynamicTab
Added gear and new close icon
Added `imagedb.loaddefaults` command
No longer use reflection for precompiled module hooks (code-generated internal hook calls)
Swapped all instances of internal hook call returnables to use already boxed values (reducing heap allocations)
[Admin Module] Fixed dead players appearing twice in the Players tab
Reduced overall CuiHelper creation overhead by removing some legacy code
Upgraded to Harmony 2.3.1.1 (Thicc)
Added MonoMod required dependencies by Harmony
Display internally fired hooks in `c.plugininfo` and other various places
**Optimized internal hooks to being called directly by the hook code generator**
Fixed `global.skipassetwarmup_crashes` OSI; this literally just showed up out of nowhere when adding the optimizations
Added `ImageDatabase.HasImage`
[Admin Module] Invalidate ImageDatabase if core images aren't in the FileStorage database of Rust (ensures images show up in Admin Module)
Replace CUI null images with white panels so there's no leaking when using Carbon's CUI system
[Admin Module] Added `adminmodule.players.see_ips` which when granted, they can see player IP address when inspecting
Implemented `IOnRconInitialize` and `IOnRunCommandLine`
Added `Rcon` config option, disabling it will turn off server RCon
Revamped entire Carbon config
Renamed `config_client.json` to `config.client.json` (it gets auto-renamed)
Renamed `carbonauto.cfg` to `config.auto.cfg` (it gets auto-renamed)
Fixed modules firing OnServerInitialized more than they should (once) & call OSI on module reload
Added `IModule.HasOSI`
Prettified Analytics code
[Admin Module] Added Admin module wizard analytic for walkthrough or skipping
[Admin Module] Fixed owned plugins glow effect in Admin module
[Admin Module] Added Grant/Revoke All permissions button on the Permissions tab (plugins, modules, groups)
Fixed `BaseHookable.ToString` formatting
Replaced `powershell` to `pwsh` in the Windows deployment process
Fixed ZipScript and ZipDevScript processors not using the correct config for watching
Filter out the three checksum validation failures on boot as that's a hook gen timing 'issue' and absolutely inoffensive
Updated, improved and optimized the hook calling process - you should see further significant performance boosts
Added `GetConfigPath()` and `GetDataPath()` to BaseModule
[Admin Module] Refresh the panel when adding, editing or duplicating groups
Print correct information if an user/group couldn't be found when using `c.grant` and `c.revoke`
Fixed certain instances where webrequests wouldn't trigger the primary callback when errors were delivered
Redirect and execute callbacks if there are internal WebRequest exception throws
[Admin Module] Added Admin module Plugins tab HidePluginIcons config
Replaced all `param string[]`s for each Queue[Batch] override (thancc Kulltero!)
Fixed code generator not properly handling stuff like `[HookMethod(nameof(Namespace.Type.Member))]`
Removed `keepArgs` from HookCaller
Cleaned up and updated all analytic metrics
Expanded on `c.plugins` to accept sorting switches (eg. `c.plugins [-j|--j|-json|-abc|--json|-t|-m|-f] [-asc])`
Added CurrentHookFires to BaseHookable
Fixed `c.grant` and `c.revoke` logic when detecting if a group has a permission
Updated the wizard when Admin module config structure has changed
[Admin Module] Added Skip button on the wizard
Added `GroupExists` to BaseModule
[Admin Module] Added module permissions in the Permissions tab
Update module permissions to register onto the module instance, not Core plugin
[Admin Module] Centered initial button on the Admin wizard
Call OnServerInit and OnPostServerInit when using `c.setmodule` (thanks Kulltero!)
[Admin Module] Fixed Admin module checkmarks disappearing from time to time by removing potentially unnecessary validation Rust file storage checks
Expanded on `c.plugininfo` and `c.moduleinfo` - `c.plugininfo PluginName [-t|m|f] [-asc]`, sorts hooks based on time (-t), memory use (-m) and fired times (-f)
Call `OnServerShutdown` when server shuts down
No longer inject `System.Memory` into plugins as it uses mscorlib redirected types
Bypass file name checking in ZipScript processors
Fixed return metadata value for `CanClientLogin` and `CanUserLogin`
[Admin Module] Fixed Admin module showing the wizard each server restart
Upgraded Roslyn compiler to C# 12
Improved and optimized hook calling internal times
Updated copyright year across all Carbon components
Added `c.harmonyload` and `c.harmonyunload`
Removed file watching from extensions and Harmony plugins
Execute IHarmonyHooks.OnLoaded and OnUnloaded methods
Added tick tracking for each cached hook (shows the exact amount of times hooks got fired)
Updated C4C protocol to 103
Refactored the way hook total time and memory usages is being stored
Added `c.fetchhooks` which will update hooks at runtime
Added hook ticks to `c.moduleinfo` and `c.plugininfo`
Show if a group or user already has a permission, instead of saying there was a problem
[Admin Module] Revamped Admin module accessibility - removed access levels and added permissions instead
Use virtual calls instead of direct for Harmony plugin entrypoint initialization (Thanks, Patrette!)

Removed GroupHasPermission Debug log

Added command aliases (support for multiple Command attributes)
Removed `CommandVar` being able to be assigned multiple times
Fixed module internal call hook overriden
Disable `server.secure` convar if Carbon client mode is enabled

Made `global.skipassetwarmup_crashes 1` possible, now works in C4C and normal modes
Fixed `c.mixingspeedmultiplier` not working properly

Corrected C4C log information showing C4C enabled when it wasn't
Made `c.plugininfo` be case insensitive as well as `c.reloadconfig`

Removed `+carbon.client` and `+carbon.nomap` since it got moved to the config
Fixed case where server wouldn't boot if there'd be multiple instances of the same server running due to log locking (appending `_temporary` to the busy server log)

Added `c.plugincmds` displaying all chat and console commands of a plugin (auth 2)
Fixed certain CUI-related issues when plugins would set offsets as null
Fixed edge case where CUI material is assigned null when it shouldn't
Ensure not caching hook method duplicates
Added support for hidden processed commands (hid `carbon.` commands from `c.find` due to duplicates)
[Admin Module] Added `SpectatingInfoOverlay` disabling center-screen text when spectating

Return bool in `OxideMod.UnloadPlugin(string)`
Added client gravity and old recoil properties to C4C

Rewrote the entire Timer system to be more lightweight.
[Admin Module] Don't display update options in the Local tab, under Plugins.
Implemented version conditional symbol processing (RUST/CARBON checking against ABV/BLW and IS current protocol)
Added permissions in `c.plugininfo`
Added module Reload and Unload overridable methods

Fixed `global.skipassetwarmup_crashes 1` behavior
Removed slight fullscreen fade when spectating

Call `OnUserPermissionRevoked` for every permission granted (when using wildcards)

Fixed `HookMethod` not being processed by the codegen
Various fixes to plugin processing and disposal
Added in-use script checking and waiting for writing availability

Fixed `c.load` not doing its job properly

Fixed NRE in Modal module

Removed `HigherPriorityHookWarns` config
Conflict and result priority fixes

Use last result value of conflicted hooks
User permissions processing fix

Properly manage Carbon patches w/out identifiers
Removed all uses of `Environment.TickCount` and instead using pooled Stopwatches

Update and rename develop-build.yml to preview-edge-build.yml
Fixed repeating timers and removed Command.SkipOriginal
Error handling in RustPlugin
Fixed plugins generating configs with null fields
Quickstart fixes and invalidated setup wizard (it'll show up on up-to-date servers)
BaseModule fix, virtualized BaseModule version, and DRM cleanup
Fixed c.report (potentially)
Removed misleading 'Is Core' and 'Is Disabled' read-only toggle options from Module inspector
Removed unnecessary self-implemented arg.ReplyWith behavior and switched to using Rust's methods
Removed OnInvalidPositionCheck as it was called about 8K times a second when used
Added missing return attributes on some Extra hooks
Updated CanPatrolHeliSeePlayer, CanUnlockTechTreeNode, OnChairComfort, OnEntitySpawn, OnChickenScared, OnHorseDung, OnJackieChan
Marked c.version and c.build as auth-level 1 requirement
Fixed Carbon not starting on Linux
Fixed HarmonyModInfo spam on Linux
Fixed exception with FileWatcher and updated Library.cs
Added validators to preloader
Fixed null/empty permissions being considered (resolves various plugin command authentication issues)
Assigned token reference of CommandVar commands
Don't attempt to grant default/admin permissions if they're set to null in the config (disables auto-granting players to groups when empty, useful in some cases)
Fixed Create Group default values
Map Protection module fixes
Fixed number fields throwing errors when SteamIDs are used (use longs instead of ints)
Fixed RustPlayer being a struct and not functioning properly
